story.title: How We Met
story.description: We met at a local coffee shop through mutual friends. It was love at first sight!

story.title: The Proposal
story.description: John proposed during our annual winter vacation, making it the most magical moment of our lives.

accommodation.text: We have reserved a block of rooms at the Grand Plaza Hotel. Please mention "Sarah and John's Wedding" when booking.

parking.text: Complimentary valet parking is available at the venue.
